credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Maira Kalman:  Max in Hollywood, Baby
description:
Max, the dog, introduced in "Hey Willy, See the Pyramids" and appearing again in "Max Makes a Million," is now in Hollywood, where he gets star treatment as he works on a movie script. Different styles, sizes and colors of type comprise both text and illustrations. Reference: New York Public Library LEO catalog (nypl.org) -
Copyright, 1992 Cahners Business Information, Inc.
name: Book
